Landing Feature Article

This component is used to promote a single piece of News or Blog content to a Landing page.

First Five Years Fund Statement on Senate FY 14 Appropriations for Early Learning

newsOunce PR Dept.

The First Five Years Fund applauds the work done today by the Senate Subcommittee on Labor, Health and Human Services, Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations to increase funding levels for early learning programs that set children on a path to success in school, career and life.
